desc.en: Real World Coupon is the next generation digital coupon built on the EOS blockchain. RWC coupon can be used worldwide at more than 10 partnering merchants. RWC coupon is also infinitely re-useable. Our revolutionary coupon model solves the pain points in the old coupon system, which is single use and only at one merchant. Real World Coupon team members are located in the US, Australia, China, Korea, Portugal, and Ukraine. We are active participants and opinion leaders in the EOS community. With our distributed team structure, we can accelerate Real World Coupon adoption worldwide.
desc.zh: 全球券，新一代数字优惠券，基于 EOS 区块链开发，应用场景遍布全球，目前已有十余个商家支持用全球券享折扣。传统优惠券仅能用一次且无法全球通用，全球券完美解决了这两大痛点，支持循环使用，无国界限制。全球券团队由来自美国、澳洲、中国、韩国、葡萄牙、乌克兰等各国 EOS 社区的意见领袖与活跃份子组成，分布式团队将推动全球券在全球范围加速落地。
